description: Try our easy to follow Pineapple & Kiwifruit Parfait recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pineapple & Kiwifruit Parfait Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lime, rind finely grated and juiced

recipeInstructions.text: Stir sugar and 3/4 cup of water in a small saucepan over medium heat until sugar has dissolved. Bring to the boil, reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes until thick and syrupy. Remove from heat and add mint. Set aside for 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, peel and finely chop kiwifruit, reserving 4 slices.
Strain sugar syrup and add to kiwifruit with lime rind and juice.
Peel, core and dice the pineapple.
Peel and dice the remaining kiwifruit.
Layer pineapple into glasses with kiwifruit sauce, yoghurt and muesli. Finish with diced kiwifruit, yoghurt and muesli and garnish with reserved kiwifruit slices.
